subject: Re: I got some Birthday wishes from the other side !!!
author: Misty
full_text:
Happy birthday to you
Happy Birthday to you 
Happy Birthday dear Rallllllllllllllphhhhhhhh
Happy Birthday to you!

Id record me singin but dont wanna kill yall just yet =)
Misty

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, "Ralph Smith" <Ralphsmi@...> wrote:
>
> Hi all,
> 
>  Just wanted to say I got up today and just turned on the RS 20-125 
> and heard some of them saying " Happy Birthday " to me and it is my 
> birthday I was shocked to hear that LOL. I also heard someone in 
the 
> background singing " Happy Birthday " too. How cool is that, no 
> coincidence seems like to me. Here is another story I was watching 
TV 
> the Grammy Awards and when Little Richard and Jerry lee Lewis was 
on 
> there was another singer with them from Credence Clearwater Revival 
I 
> couldn't remember his name. So as I was listening to the spirits I 
> heard a voice today say " John Fogerty " is that his name I think 
it 
> is? How cool was that ? Oh well just some stuff to ponder on. You 
all 
> have a great evening.
> 
> Regards,
> 
> Ralph the Ghost Hunter
>
